original: intros m x x' z Hmap. unfold cA. unfold Br1. assert (H: succ m zero x = true). { apply double_link_succ; auto. } destruct (succ_dec m zero x) as [H0 | H0]; rewrite H0. - destruct (succ_dec m zero x') as [H1 | H1]; rewrite H1. + apply cA0_Br1; auto. + apply cA1_Br1; auto. - apply not_succ_br; auto.
